repl_description:
A Homework for Life journaling application that enables users to create, manage, and review journal entries with AI-powered writing prompts. The system implements a multi-user architecture with secure user authentication, allowing users to maintain personal journal entries and access their historical records through a web interface. The application features dynamic quote generation with fallback systems and comprehensive error handling.

Tech Stack:
• Flask backend with SQLAlchemy ORM
• PostgreSQL database
• User authentication and session management
• Template-based rendering system
• AI-powered writing prompts
• Dynamic quote generation with fallback system
• Database migrations for version control
